articles.original_title: November Technology Portfolio Launches With Insights From Apple, PepsiCo, Vodafone, and Johnson Controls
articles.original_body: The November editions of BizClik’s Technology portfolio are now live, featuring fresh insights from AI Magazine, Technology Magazine, Telco Magazine and Data Centre Magazine. This month’s issues spotlight global leaders, breakthrough technologies and the strategies shaping the future of AI, data and digital infrastructure. London - 11 November 2025 - BizClik, a global B2B media and events company, has released the latest magazine editions of its Technology portfolio, featuring: Technology Magazi

articles.original_title: Tesla's First Semi Vehicle Customer After Full Production Launch Is….Tesla? - Tesla  ( NASDAQ:TSLA )
articles.original_body: Tesla Inc. ( NASDAQ:TSLA ) has several new vehicles entering full-scale production in 2026, including the Tesla Semi. While this is exciting for investors, news of the Tesla Semi's first customer after the launch is less so. PepsiCo has been operating Tesla Semi vehicles as part of a pilot ...
